header.title: Hello! I'm Facundo
header.text: I'm a web developer specialized in React and React Native with good back-end knowledge. I enjoy looking for the most efficient ways to solve problems by making the code as understandable and neat as possible.

aboutMe.title: about me
text: My name is Facundo Campos, I'm 25 years old and I live in Buenos Aires City, Argentina.
I'm a front-end developer specialized in React JS. I enjoy learning new technologies, so I'm in constant development.

I started an Industrial Engineering career when I graduated from high school, but after a few years I realized that it wasn't what I was Interested in. There I had a semester with introduction to programming, a subject that I loved and I realized that it was what I was really passionate about. That's why in 2022 I decided to change course for good.
I am open to job opportunities where I can contribute, learn and grow professionally.
